availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Macklin Robb. Father of Mattie Robb, Mary Robb, and Willis Robb. Clerk in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 52A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 246.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Milville, p. 488A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994034, Franklin County Births.
"Death of George W. Robb," The Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), March 26, 1892, p. 2.
"George W. Robb (1825-1892)," Find A Grave, Memorial 42390634, accessed November 10, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42390634.
